entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
